scripts.build:win: npm run build:bundle && pkg dist/bundle.cjs --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/win-x64/Astral.exe --compress Brotli && node scripts/postbuild.js win && mv dist/win-x64/Astral-signed.exe dist/win-x64/Astral-win-x64.exe
scripts.build:linux: npm run build:bundle && pkg dist/bundle.cjs --targets node18-linux-x64 --output dist/linux-x64/astral --compress Brotli && node scripts/postbuild.js linux && cp scripts/install.sh dist/linux-x64/install.sh && tar -czvf dist/linux-x64/Astral-linux-x64.tar.gz -C dist/linux-x64 astral Astral.desktop astral.png install.sh
scripts.build:mac: npm run build:bundle && pkg dist/bundle.cjs --targets node18-macos-x64 --output dist/mac-x64/Astral.app/Contents/MacOS/astral && cp scripts/mac-launcher.sh dist/mac-x64/Astral.app/Contents/MacOS/launcher && chmod +x dist/mac-x64/Astral.app/Contents/MacOS/Astral && node scripts/postbuild.js mac && create-dmg --volname 'Astral Proxy' --volicon 'assets/icon.icns' --window-size 500 300 --icon-size 100 --icon 'Astral.app' 100 150 --app-drop-link 400 150 dist/mac-x64/Astral-mac-x64.dmg dist/mac-x64/
scripts.build:all: npm run build:win && npm run build:linux && npm run build:mac
scripts.build:exe: npm run build:bundle && pkg dist/bundle.cjs --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/Astral.exe
scripts.build:exe:signed: npm run build:exe && npm run sign:exe
